entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Richelieu
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:56 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
